user.title: Configure device
user.description: Enter the IP address of your HomeWizard Energy device to integrate with Home Assistant.

discovery_confirm.title: Confirm
discovery_confirm.description: Do you want to setup {product_type} ({serial}) at {ip_address}?

abort.api_not_enabled: The API is not enabled. Enable API in the HomeWizard Energy App under settings

api_disabled.title: Local access to {device_name} is disabled
api_disabled.description:
Local access to this device is disabled in the HomeWizard Energy App

Home Assistant uses the local API to get data from {device_name}, but the API is disabled at this moment.

Press 'Learn more' to see how to re-enable the API in the HomeWizard Energy app.
